message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been valued at $1,500,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you today for an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special opportunity to own this product at a significant discount, so I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the discount, $1,200,000 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for me and allows for some room for both of us to be happy with the deal.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product and your willingness to pay $1,050,000, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise while still ensuring a good return on investment for me.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $1,100,000 is still above my budget. I'm prepared to offer $1,075,000 for the product. This is a fair price that reflects the value I place on the product and allows for a comfortable margin for both of us. I believe this is a good compromise and hope we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. Considering your latest proposal of $1,075,000, I am willing to consider a final offer of $1,087,500 for the product. This price reflects a slight increase from my previous counteroffer, but still leaves room for a fair profit for me. I hope this aligns better with your budget and we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties.
